text: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes is an American movie directed by Wes Ball and written by Josh Friedman, Rick Jaffa, Amanda Silver, and Patrick Aison. It is the fourth movie in the rebooted Planet of the Apes movie series after Rise of the Planet of the Apes (2011), Dawn of the Planet of the Apes, and War for the Planet of the Apes (2017). It stars Owen Teague, Freya Allan, Kevin Durand, Peter Macon, and William H. Macy. The movie was released on May 10, 2024. It got positive reviews. It was the first Planet of the Apes movie released under 20th Century Studios after Disney's acquisition of the studio. It was also the first movie to be released on home video by Sony Pictures Home Entertainment on August 27, 2024. == Cast == * Owen Teague as Noa * Freya Allan as Mae * Kevin Durand as Proximus Caesar * Peter Macon as Raka * William H. title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
